atk-s0501a4:2: Idāni ekaṁ nāma kinti evamādīnaṁ kumārapañhānaṁ atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto. Tesaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ idha nikkhepappayojanañca vatvā vaṇṇanaṁ karissāma –
atk-s0501a4:3_0: Aṭṭhuppatti tāva nesaṁ sopāko nāma bhagavato mahāsāvako ahosi. Tenāyasmatā jātiyā
atk-s0501a4:3_1: sattavasseneva aññā ārādhitā, tassa bhagavā pañhabyākaraṇena upasampadaṁ anuññātukāmo
atk-s0501a4:3_2: attanā adhippetatthānaṁ pañhānaṁ byākaraṇasamatthataṁ passanto ‘‘ekaṁ nāma ki’’nti
atk-s0501a4:3_3: evamādinā pañhe pucchi. So byākāsi. Tena ca byākaraṇena bhagavato cittaṁ ārādhesi.
atk-s0501a4:6_0: Yasmā pana saraṇagamanehi buddhadhammasaṅghānussativasena cittabhāvanā, sikkhāpadehi
atk-s0501a4:6_1: sīlabhāvanā, dvattiṁsākārena ca kāyabhāvanā pakāsitā, tasmā idāni nānappakārato paññābhāvanāmukhadassanatthaṁ
atk-s0501a4:6_2: ime pañhabyākaraṇā idha nikkhittā. Yasmā vā sīlapadaṭṭhāno samādhi, samādhipadaṭṭhānā
atk-s0501a4:6_3: ca paññā; yathāha – ‘‘sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvaya’’nti
atk-s0501a4:6_4: (saṁ. ni. 1.23, 192), tasmā sikkhāpadehi sīlaṁ dvattiṁsākārena taṁgocaraṁ samādhiñca
atk-s0501a4:6_5: dassetvā samāhitacittassa nānādhammaparikkhārāya paññāya pabhedadassanatthaṁ idha
atk-s0501a4:10_0: Idāni tesaṁ atthavaṇṇanā hoti – ekaṁ nāma kinti bhagavā yasmiṁ ekadhammasmiṁ bhikkhu
atk-s0501a4:10_1: sammā nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, yasmiṁ cāyamāyasmā nibbindamāno
atk-s0501a4:10_2: anupubbena dukkhassantamakāsi, taṁ dhammaṁ sandhāya pañhaṁ pucchati. ‘‘Sabbe sattā
atk-s0501a4:10_3: āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti thero puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti. ‘‘Katamā ca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a4:10_4: sammāsati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.8)
atk-s0501a4:10_5: evamādīni cettha suttāni evaṁ vissajjanayuttisambhave sādhakāni. Ettha yenāhārena
atk-s0501a4:10_6: sabbe sattā ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti vuccanti, so āhāro taṁ vā nesaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ
atk-s0501a4:10_7: ‘‘ekaṁ nāma ki’’nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṁ. Tañhi bhagavatā idha
atk-s0501a4:10_8: ekanti adhippetaṁ, na tu sāsane loke vā aññaṁ ekaṁ nāma natthīti ñāpetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:11_0: ‘‘Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno
atk-s0501a4:11_1: sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:11_2: Katamasmiṁ ekadhamme? Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Imasmiṁ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme
atk-s0501a4:11_3: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Eko pañho eko uddeso ekaṁ
atk-s0501a4:11_4: veyyākaraṇa’nti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:12_0: Āhāraṭṭhitikāti cettha yathā ‘‘atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṁ. Tattha ayoniso manasikārabahulīkāro,
atk-s0501a4:12_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni. 5.232)
atk-s0501a4:12_2: paccayo āhāroti vuccati, evaṁ paccayaṁ āhārasaddena gahetvā paccayaṭṭhitikā ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti
atk-s0501a4:12_3: vuttā. Cattāro pana āhāre sandhāya – ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti vuccamāne ‘‘asaññasattā
atk-s0501a4:12_4: devā ahetukā anāhārā aphassakā avedanakā’’ti vacanato (vibha. 1017) ‘‘sabbe’’ti vacanamayuttaṁ bhaveyya.
atk-s0501a4:13_0: Tattha siyā – evampi vuccamāne ‘‘katame dhammā sapaccayā? Pañcakkhandhā – rūpakkhandho…pe…
atk-s0501a4:13_1: viññāṇakkhandho’’ti (dha. sa. 1089) vacanato khandhānaṁyeva paccayaṭṭhitikattaṁ yuttaṁ,
atk-s0501a4:13_2: sattānantu ayuttamevetaṁ vacanaṁ bhaveyyāti. Na kho panetaṁ evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kasmā
atk-s0501a4:13_3: ? Sattesu khandhopacārasiddhito. Sattesu hi khandhopacāro siddho. Kasmā? Khandhe
atk-s0501a4:13_4: upādāya paññāpetabbato. Kathaṁ? Gehe gāmopacāro viya. Seyyathāpi hi gehāni upādāya
atk-s0501a4:13_5: paññāpetabbattā gāmassa ekasmimpi dvīsu tīsupi vā gehesu daḍḍhesu ‘‘gāmo daḍḍho’’ti
atk-s0501a4:13_6: evaṁ gehe gāmopacāro siddho, evameva khandhesu paccayaṭṭhena āhāraṭṭhitikesu ‘‘sattā
atk-s0501a4:13_7: āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti ayaṁ upacāro siddhoti veditabbo. Paramatthato ca khandhesu jāyamānesu
atk-s0501a4:13_8: jīyamānesu mīyamānesu ca ‘‘khaṇe khaṇe tvaṁ bhikkhu jāyase ca jīyase ca mīyase cā’’ti
atk-s0501a4:13_9: vadatā bhagavatā tesu sattesu khandhopacāro siddhoti dassito evāti veditabbo. Yato
atk-s0501a4:13_10: yena paccayākhyena āhārena sabbe sattā tiṭṭhanti, so āhāro taṁ vā nesaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ
atk-s0501a4:13_11: ekanti veditabbaṁ. Āhāro hi āhāraṭṭhitikattaṁ vā aniccatākāraṇato nibbidāṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0501a4:13_12: hoti. Atha tesu sabbasattasaññitesu saṅkhāresu aniccatādassanena nibbindamāno anupubbena
atk-s0501a4:15: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā’’ti. (dha. pa. 277);
atk-s0501a4:16_0: Ettha ca ‘‘ekaṁ nāma ki’’nti ca ‘‘kihā’’ti ca duvidho pāṭho, tattha sīhaḷānaṁ kihāti
atk-s0501a4:16_1: pāṭho. Te hi ‘‘ki’’nti vattabbe ‘‘kihā’’ti vadanti. Keci bhaṇanti ‘‘ha-iti nipāto,
atk-s0501a4:16_2: theriyānampi ayameva pāṭho’’ti ubhayathāpi pana ekova attho. Yathā ruccati, tathā
atk-s0501a4:16_3: paṭhitabbaṁ. Yathā pana ‘‘sukhena phuṭṭho atha vā dukhena (dha. pa. 83), dukkhaṁ
atk-s0501a4:16_4: domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedetī’’ti evamādīsu katthaci dukhanti ca katthaci dukkhanti ca
atk-s0501a4:16_5: vuccati, evaṁ katthaci ekanti, katthaci ekkanti vuccati. Idha pana ekaṁ nāmāti ayameva pāṭho.
atk-s0501a4:18_0: Evaṁ iminā pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati
atk-s0501a4:18_1: dve nāma kinti? Thero dveti paccanubhāsitvā ‘‘nāmañca rūpañcā’’ti dhammādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0501a4:18_2: desanāya vissajjeti. Tattha ārammaṇābhimukhaṁ namanato, cittassa ca natihetuto sabbampi
atk-s0501a4:18_3: arūpaṁ ‘‘nāma’’nti vuccati. Idha pana nibbidāhetuttā sāsavadhammameva adhippetaṁ
atk-s0501a4:18_4: ruppanaṭṭhena cattāro ca mahābhūtā, sabbañca tadupādāya pavattamānaṁ rūpaṁ ‘‘rūpa’’nti
atk-s0501a4:18_5: vuccati, taṁ sabbampi idhādhippetaṁ. Adhippāyavaseneva cettha ‘‘dve nāma nāmañca
atk-s0501a4:18_6: rūpañcā’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ dvinnamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:19_0: ‘‘Dvīsu , bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:19_1: Katamesu dvīsu? Nāme ca rūpe ca. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, dvīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā
atk-s0501a4:19_2: nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Dve pañhā, dve uddesā, dve veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a4:19_3: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:20: Ettha ca nāmarūpamattadassanena attadiṭṭhiṁ pahāya anattānupassanāmukheneva nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṁ pāpuṇātīti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:22: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā’’ti. (dha. pa. 279);
atk-s0501a4:24_0: Idāni imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ
atk-s0501a4:24_1: pucchati tīṇi nāma kinti? Thero tīṇīti paccanubhāsitvā puna byākaritabbassa atthassa
atk-s0501a4:24_2: liṅgānurūpaṁ saṅkhyaṁ dassento ‘‘tisso vedanā’’ti vissajjeti. Atha vā ‘‘yā bhagavatā
atk-s0501a4:24_3: ‘tisso vedanā’ti vuttā, imāsamatthamahaṁ tīṇīti paccemī’’ti dassento āhāti evampettha
atk-s0501a4:24_4: attho veditabbo. Anekamukhā hi desanā paṭisambhidāpabhedena desanāvilāsappattānaṁ.
atk-s0501a4:24_5: Keci panāhu ‘‘tīṇīti adhikapadamida’’nti. Purimanayeneva cettha ‘‘tisso vedanā’’ti
atk-s0501a4:25_0: ‘‘Tīsu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:25_1: Katamesu tīsu? Tīsu vedanāsu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, tīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe…
atk-s0501a4:25_2: dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Tayo pañhā, tayo uddesā, tīṇi veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ
atk-s0501a4:26: Ettha ca ‘‘yaṁkiñci vedayitaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ dukkhasminti vadāmī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 4.259) vuttasuttānusārena vā. –
atk-s0501a4:29_1: dukkhabhāvadassanena sukhasaññaṁ pahāya dukkhānupassanāmukhena nibbindamāno anupubbena
atk-s0501a4:29_2: dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṁ pāpuṇātīti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:31: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā’’ti. (dha. pa. 278);
atk-s0501a4:33_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati
atk-s0501a4:33_1: cattāri nāma kinti? Tattha imassa pañhassa byākaraṇapakkhe katthaci purimanayeneva
atk-s0501a4:34_0: ‘‘Catūsu , bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:34_1: Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu āhāresu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā
atk-s0501a4:34_2: nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a4:34_3: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:35: Katthaci yesu subhāvitacitto anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, tāni cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni. Yathāha kajaṅgalā bhikkhunī –
atk-s0501a4:36_0: ‘‘Catūsu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṁ
atk-s0501a4:36_1: abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu.
atk-s0501a4:36_2: Imesu kho, āvuso, catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro
atk-s0501a4:36_3: hoti. ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:37_0: Idha pana yesaṁ catunnaṁ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti, yasmā tāni cattāri
atk-s0501a4:37_1: ariyasaccāni adhippetāni. Yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṁ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a4:37_2: tasmā thero cattārīti paccanubhāsitvā ‘‘ariyasaccānī’’ti vissajjeti. Tattha cattārīti
atk-s0501a4:37_3: gaṇanaparicchedo. Ariyasaccānīti ariyāni saccāni, avitathāni avisaṁvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:38: ‘‘Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.1097).
atk-s0501a4:39_0: Yasmā vā sadevakena lokena araṇīyato abhigamanīyatoti vuttaṁ hoti, vāyamitabbaṭṭhānasaññite
atk-s0501a4:39_1: aye vā iriyanato, anaye vā na iriyanato, sattatiṁsabodhipakkhiyaariyadhammasamāyogato
atk-s0501a4:39_2: vā ariyasammatā buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā etāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmāpi ‘‘ariyasaccānī’’ti vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:40: ‘‘Cattārimāni , bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni, ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī’’ti.
atk-s0501a4:41: Apica ariyassa bhagavato saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:42: ‘‘Sadevake, bhikkhave…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.1098).
atk-s0501a4:43: Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:44: ‘‘Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddhoti vuccatī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.1093).
atk-s0501a4:45: Ayametesaṁ padattho. Etesaṁ pana ariyasaccānaṁ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:46_0: ‘‘Tayidaṁ , bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ anubuddhaṁ paṭividdhaṁ…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā
atk-s0501a4:46_1: ariyasaccaṁ anubuddhaṁ paṭividdhaṁ, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti, natthi
atk-s0501a4:48_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati
atk-s0501a4:48_1: pañca nāma kinti? Thero pañcāti paccanubhāsitvā ‘‘upādānakkhandhā’’ti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:48_2: Tattha pañcāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Upādānajanitā upādānajanakā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā.
atk-s0501a4:48_3: Yaṁkiñci rūpaṁ, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇañca sāsavā upādāniyā, etesametaṁ
atk-s0501a4:48_4: adhivacanaṁ. Pubbanayeneva cettha ‘‘pañcupādānakkhandhā’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ pañcannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:49_0: ‘‘Pañcasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:49_1: Katamesu pañcasu? Pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, pañcasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a4:49_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Pañca pañhā, pañca uddesā
atk-s0501a4:49_3: , pañca veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:50: Ettha ca pañcakkhandhe udayabbayavasena sammasanto vipassanāmataṁ laddhā anupubbena nibbānāmataṁ sacchikaroti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:52: Labhatī pītipāmojjaṁ, amataṁ taṁ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 374);
atk-s0501a4:54_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati
atk-s0501a4:54_1: ‘‘cha nāma ki’’nti? Thero chaiti paccanubhāsitvā ‘ajjhattikāni āyatanānī’ti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:54_2: Tattha chaiti gaṇanaparicchedo, ajjhatte niyuttāni, attānaṁ vā adhikatvā pavattāni
atk-s0501a4:54_3: ajjhattikāni. Āyatanato, āyassa vā tananato, āyatassa vā saṁsāradukkhassa nayanato
atk-s0501a4:54_5: ajjhattikāni āyatanānī’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ channamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:55_0: ‘‘Chasu , bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:55_1: Katamesu chasu? Chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, chasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a4:55_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Cha pañhā cha uddesā cha veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a4:55_3: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:56_0: Ettha ca cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, ‘‘suñño gāmoti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ
atk-s0501a4:56_1: āyatanānaṁ adhivacana’’nti (saṁ. ni. 4.238) vacanato suññato pubbuḷakamarīcikādīni
atk-s0501a4:56_2: viya aciraṭṭhitikato tucchato vañcanato ca samanupassaṁ nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantaṁ
atk-s0501a4:58: Evaṁ lokaṁ avekkhantaṁ, maccurājā na passatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 170);
atk-s0501a4:60_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati satta nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:60_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttā, apica kho pana yesu
atk-s0501a4:60_2: dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti, te dassento ‘‘satta bojjhaṅgā’’ti
atk-s0501a4:60_3: vissajjeti. Ayampi cattho bhagavatā anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:61_0: ‘‘Paṇḍitā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī, mahāpaññā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī,
atk-s0501a4:61_1: mañcepi tumhe gahapatayo upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi cetaṁ
atk-s0501a4:61_2: evameva byākareyyaṁ, yathā taṁ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata’’nti (a. ni. 10.28).
atk-s0501a4:63_0: ‘‘Sattasu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:63_1: Katamesu sattasu? Sattasu bojjhaṅgesu. Imesu kho, āvuso, sattasu dhammesu bhikkhu
atk-s0501a4:63_2: sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Satta pañhā satta uddesā satta veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a4:63_3: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.28).
atk-s0501a4:65_0: Tattha sattāti ūnādhikanivāraṇagaṇanaparicchedo. Bojjhaṅgāti satiādīnaṁ dhammānametaṁ
atk-s0501a4:65_1: adhivacanaṁ. Tatrāyaṁ padattho – etāya lokiyalokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādi-
atk-s0501a4:65_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhi, kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0501a4:65_4: cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0501a4:65_5: Yathāha – ‘‘satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’’ti.
atk-s0501a4:65_6: Yathāvuttappakārāya vā etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvakopi bodhi.
atk-s0501a4:65_7: Iti tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgabhūtattā bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni
atk-s0501a4:65_8: viya, tassa vā bodhīti laddhavohārassa ariyasāvakassa aṅgabhūtattāpi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0501a4:66_0: Apica ‘‘bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṁvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti
atk-s0501a4:66_1: bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā’’ti
atk-s0501a4:66_2: (paṭi. ma. 2.17) imināpi paṭisambhidāyaṁ vuttena vidhinā bojjhaṅgānaṁ bojjhaṅgaṭṭho
atk-s0501a4:66_3: veditabbo. Evamime satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento bahulīkaronto na cirasseva ekantanibbidādiguṇapaṭilābhī
atk-s0501a4:66_4: hoti, tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati . Vuttañcetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a4:67: ‘‘Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattantī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.201).
atk-s0501a4:69_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati aṭṭha nāma
atk-s0501a4:69_1: kinti? Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe aṭṭha lokadhammā vuttā, apica kho pana yesu
atk-s0501a4:69_2: dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti, te dassento ‘‘ariyāni aṭṭha
atk-s0501a4:69_3: maggaṅgānī’’ti avatvā yasmā aṭṭhaṅgavinimutto maggo nāma natthi, aṭṭhaṅgamattameva
atk-s0501a4:69_4: tu maggo, tasmā tamatthaṁ sādhento desanāvilāsena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a4:69_5: Bhagavatāpi cāyamattho desanānayo ca anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:70: ‘‘Paṇḍitā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī…pe… ahampi evameva byākareyyaṁ, yathā taṁ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata’’nti (a. ni. 10.28).
atk-s0501a4:72_0: ‘‘Aṭṭhasu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:72_1: ‘Aṭṭha pañhā, aṭṭha uddesā, aṭṭha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a4:73: Evamayaṁ attho ca desanānayo ca bhagavatā anumato evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a4:74_0: Tattha ariyoti nibbānatthikehi abhigantabbo, apica ārakā kilesehi vattanato, ariyabhāvakaraṇato,
atk-s0501a4:74_1: ariyaphalapaṭilābhato cāpi ariyoti veditabbo. Aṭṭha aṅgāni assāti aṭṭhaṅgiko. Svāyaṁ
atk-s0501a4:74_2: caturaṅgikā viya senā, pañcaṅgikaṁ viya ca tūriyaṁ aṅgavinibbhogena anupalabbhasabhāvato
atk-s0501a4:74_3: aṅgamattamevāti veditabbo. Maggati iminā nibbānaṁ, sayaṁ vā maggati, kilese mārento
atk-s0501a4:75_0: Evamaṭṭhappabhedañcimaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento bhikkhu avijjaṁ bhindati, vijjaṁ
atk-s0501a4:75_1: uppādeti, nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti, tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0501a4:76_0: ‘‘Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sālisūkaṁ vā yavasūkaṁ vā sammā paṇihitaṁ hatthena vā pādena
atk-s0501a4:76_1: vā akkantaṁ hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā bhecchati, lohitaṁ vā uppādessatīti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
atk-s0501a4:76_2: Taṁ kissa hetu? Sammā paṇihitattā, bhikkhave, sūkassa, evameva kho, bhikkhave , so
atk-s0501a4:76_3: vata bhikkhu sammā paṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammā paṇihitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjaṁ bhecchati,
atk-s0501a4:76_4: vijjaṁ uppādessati, nibbānaṁ sacchikarissatīti ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī’’ti (a. ni. 1.42).
atk-s0501a4:78_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati nava nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a4:78_1: Thero navaiti paccanubhāsitvā ‘‘sattāvāsā’’ti vissajjeti. Tattha navāti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0501a4:78_2: Sattāti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhe khandhe upādāya paññattā pāṇino paṇṇatti vā. Āvāsāti
atk-s0501a4:78_3: āvasanti etesūti āvāsā, sattānaṁ āvāsā sattāvāsā. Esa desanāmaggo, atthato pana navavidhānaṁ
atk-s0501a4:79_0: ‘‘Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā
atk-s0501a4:79_1: ekacce ca vinipātikā, ayaṁ paṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino,
atk-s0501a4:79_2: seyyathāpi, devā brahmakāyikā, paṭhamābhinibbattā, ayaṁ dutiyo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_3: sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā ābhassarā, ayaṁ tatiyo sattāvāso.
atk-s0501a4:79_4: Santāvuso, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā subhakiṇhā, ayaṁ catuttho
atk-s0501a4:79_5: sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā asaññino appaṭisaṁvedino, seyyathāpi, devā asaññasattā,
atk-s0501a4:79_6: ayaṁ pañcamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ…pe… ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā
atk-s0501a4:79_7: , ayaṁ chaṭṭho sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā…pe… viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā, ayaṁ sattamo
atk-s0501a4:79_8: sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā…pe… ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā, ayaṁ aṭṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a4:79_9: sattā…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagā, ayaṁ navamo sattāvāso’’ti (dī. ni. 3.341).
atk-s0501a4:80: Purimanayeneva cettha ‘‘nava sattāvāsā’’ti vuttaṁ, na aññesaṁ navannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:81_0: ‘‘Navasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:81_1: Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, navasu dhammesu bhikkhu
atk-s0501a4:81_2: sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Nava pañhā , nava uddesā, nava veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a4:81_3: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:82_0: Ettha ca ‘‘nava dhammā pariññeyyā. Katame nava? Nava sattāvāsā’’ti (dī. ni. 3.359)
atk-s0501a4:82_1: vacanato navasu sattāvāsesu ñātapariññāya dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvadassanaṁ pahāya
atk-s0501a4:82_3: virajjamāno dukkhānupassanena vimuccamāno anattānupassanena sammā pariyantadassāvī
atk-s0501a4:82_4: pahānapariññāya sammattamabhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Tenetaṁ vuttaṁ –
atk-s0501a4:83: ‘‘Navasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesū’’ti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:85_0: Evaṁ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchati dasa nāma
atk-s0501a4:85_1: kinti? Tattha kiñcāpi imassa pañhassa ito aññatra veyyākaraṇesu dasa akusalakammapathā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a4:86_0: ‘‘Dasasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a4:86_1: Katamesu dasasu? Dasasu akusalakammapathesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, dasasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a4:86_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe. … dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Dasa pañhā dasa uddesā dasa
atk-s0501a4:86_3: veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vutta’’nti (a. ni. 10.27).
atk-s0501a4:87_0: Idha pana yasmā ayamāyasmā attānaṁ anupanetvā aññaṁ byākātukāmo, yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena
atk-s0501a4:87_1: byākataṁ subyākatameva hoti, tasmā yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a4:87_2: tesaṁ adhigamaṁ dīpento dasahaṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0501a4:87_3: desanāya vissajjeti. Yato ettha yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a4:87_4: tāni dasaṅgāni ‘‘dasa nāma ki’’nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni. Tāni ca dasa –
atk-s0501a4:88_0: ‘‘Asekho asekhoti, bhante, vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu asekho hotīti?
atk-s0501a4:88_1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsaṅkappena
atk-s0501a4:88_2: samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvācāya samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammākammantena
atk-s0501a4:88_3: samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāājīvena samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāvāyāmena
atk-s0501a4:88_4: samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāsatiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsamādhinā
atk-s0501a4:88_5: samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāñāṇena samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvimuttiyā
atk-s0501a4:88_6: samannāgato hoti. Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekho hotī’’ti (a. ni. 10.111). –
